Name: File System - Zip Directory Contents
Description:
Creates a zip archive that contains the files and directories from the specified directory, uses the specified compression level, and optionally includes the base directory.

Requires .NET 4.5 as it relies on the `System.IO.Compression.ZipFile` class.
Author: caioproiete

Parameters.Name: SourceDirectoryName
Parameters.Label: Source Directory
Parameters.HelpText: The path to the directory to be archived, specified as a relative or absolute path.

Parameters.Name: DestinationArchiveFileName
Parameters.Label: Destination Archive File
Parameters.HelpText: The path of the archive to be created, specified as a relative or absolute path.

Parameters.Name: CompressionLevel
Parameters.Label: Compression Level
Parameters.HelpText: Indicates whether to emphasize speed or compression effectiveness when creating the entry.

Parameters.Name: IncludeBaseDirectory
Parameters.Label: Include Base Directory
Parameters.HelpText: Include the directory name from Source Directory at the root of the archive.

Parameters.Name: OverwriteDestination
Parameters.Label: Overwrite Destination If Exists
Parameters.HelpText: Overwrite the destination archive file if it already exists.
